joint_mouse.description: Names of all genes in the annotation
joint_mouse.contents: Plain text (.txt) file with one gene name on each line of the file

joint_mouse.description: Cluster names in the short format ('F-e12 DRGC') in the order of the dendrogram in Fig 1 of Jessa et al, Nat Genet, 2019
joint_mouse.contents: R object containing a vector called 'dendrogram_order', where elements are cluster names

joint_mouse.description: Feather file with mean expression of every gene in every cluster
joint_mouse.contents: Table with first column 'Cluster' and the rest corresponding to genes, containing the mean expression of each gene in each cluster

joint_mouse.description: Feather file with proportion of cells in each cluster where each gene is detected
joint_mouse.contents: Table with first column 'Cluster' and the rest corresponding to genes, containing the 'Pct1' value for each cluster

joint_mouse.description: Names of all genes detected in the joint mouse dataset
joint_mouse.contents: Data frame with one column, 'genes', containing gene symbols

joint_mouse.description: Feather file with cluster assignments, low-dimensional embeddings, QC stats, and expression values for all genes in all cells in the joint mouse space
joint_mouse.contents: Table with columns corresponding to features or cell metadata info, and rows corresponding to cells

joint_mouse.description: Colour palette for clusters derived from individual samples
joint_mouse.contents: R object containing a named vector, where names are cluster names, and values are hex colour codes

joint_mouse.description: Cluster metadata for all clusters derived from individual samples including Age, Species, full cell type, number of cells, etc; roughly matching Table 2a in Jessa et al, Nat Genet, 2019
joint_mouse.contents: TSV file where columns correspond to metadata features, one row per cluster

joint_mouse.description: Common colour palettes for red-blue gradients and for cortex/pons samples
joint_mouse.contents: R data file with three objects, rdbu (red-blue palette), cortex_palette, and pons_palette

joint_cortex.description: Names of all genes detected in the joint cortex dataset
joint_cortex.contents: Data frame with one column, 'genes', containing gene symbols

joint_cortex.description: Feather file with cluster assignments, low-dimensional embeddings, QC stats, and expression values for all genes in all cells in the joint cortex space
joint_cortex.contents: Table with columns corresponding to features or cell metadata info, and rows corresponding to cells

joint_cortex.description: Colour palette for clustering at the joint cortex level, from the 20190715 annotation
joint_cortex.contents: Rds file with character vector, where names are clusters and values are hex codes

joint_cortex.description: Feather file with 2D PCA and tSNE coordinates for all cells included in the joint_cortex object, but from the individual sample space

joint_pons.description: Names of all genes detected in the joint pons dataset
joint_pons.contents: Data frame with one column, 'genes', containing gene symbols

joint_pons.description: Feather file with cluster assignments, low-dimensional embeddings, QC stats, and expression values for all genes in all cells in the joint pons space
joint_pons.contents: Table with columns corresponding to features or cell metadata info, and rows corresponding to cells

joint_pons.description: Colour palette for clustering at the joint pons level, from the 20190715 annotation
joint_pons.contents: Rds file with character vector, where names are clusters and values are hex codes

joint_pons.description: Feather file with 2D PCA and tSNE coordinates for all cells included in the joint_pons object, but from the individual sample space
